  • 所有已实现的接口:

    直接已知子类:
    AbstractProcessDefinitionDetailPanel, AdminCompletedInstancesPanel, AdminDatabaseSettingsPanel, AdminRunningInstancesPanel, DatabaseDetailPanel, DeploymentDetailPanel, EditorProcessDefinitionDetailPanel, EventOverviewPanel, GroupDetailPanel, HistoricTaskDetailPanel, JobDetailPanel, ProcessInstanceDetailPanel, ReportDetailPanel, SavedReportDetailPanel, TaskDetailPanel, UserDetailPanel

    public class DetailPanel
extends com.vaadin.ui.VerticalLayout
    Panel that should be used for main-content. Use setDetailContainer(ComponentContainer) and setFixedButtons(Component) to add main components. By default, the detailContent will be a verticallayout which has 100% width and undefined height and margins enabled. Add components to detail container using addDetailComponent(Component) etc.
    作者:
    Frederik Heremans
    另请参阅:
    序列化表格
